preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 1200 g of Lead (Pb) using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh out 100 g of Scandium (Sc). 
 3. Weigh out 2700 g of Zirconium (Zr). 
 4. Combine all three materials in a heat-resistant mixing container. 
 5. Mix thoroughly using a mechanical stirrer to ensure a uniform composition.
